title: dani's black bean burgers
ingredients: 4 cans black beans, unsalted, rinsed and drained
1 large zucchini (300g pre-shred), grated and pressed
instructions: Spread beans on a sheet tray and dry in the oven for 5–10 minutes while prepping the vegetables.
Combine all ingredients in a large bowl and mash until a blackish mixture forms with visible black bean speckles.
Bake at 375°F for 12 minutes on each side.
